byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The team of lawyers at Skadden helping to draft MF Global's Chapter 11 filing is familiar with the failed brokerage's assets -- they sold many of them six years ago in Refco's bankruptcy case.
snippet: The team of lawyers at Skadden helping to draft MF Global's Chapter 11 filing is familiar with the failed brokerage's assets -- they sold many of them six years ago in Refco's bankruptcy case.
lead_paragraph: As MF Global filed for bankruptcy on Monday, it used lawyers who know some of its operations rather well -- since they helped sell them six years ago.

headline.main: In Skadden, MF Global Turns to Familiar Faces for Bankruptcy Filing
